name: The Community Center (Neva Jo)
description:
A mystery game I made for my writing class final.

A visual novel with words, many of them.  And characters!  There is a worm, as nobody requested,  but everybody should.  2 whole endings,  please do not get the bad one!

And maybe a chapter 2 someday, who knows? I do, but I won't say anything!

Controls: Use enter and arrow keys OR the mouse

☼ PLEASE PUT THE GAME IN FULL SCREEN ☼
